section.title: Download
section.para: You can download Atomik from the Atomik website

Atomik is distributed under two forms:
An archive containg a full directory structure A single file
You can create your own Atomik distribution online with Atomik Builder. It allows you to pack in plugins and pre-configure your installation online.

listitem.para: Upload or move Atomik files and folders into a directory available from the web.
Copy the index.php file to a directory available from the web
Open a terminal and enter the following command: php index.php init
You can also use the --htaccess option to create a .htaccess file: php index.php init --htaccess
